hero.title: Woodbine Casino – Gaming, Entertainment & Luxury in Toronto

history.title: About Woodbine Casino
history.description2: Woodbine Casino is a modern entertainment resort combining gaming, comfort, and style. It offers a wide selection of slot machines and table games, along with a convenient hotel and dining options. Guests can enjoy live shows, relax in lounge areas, and try their luck in a luxurious setting. Its location next to the racetrack makes it a unique destination. The casino operates 24/7, providing nonstop excitement.
history.description3: It’s the perfect place for those seeking thrill, comfort, and memorable experiences.

customHtml.title: Woodbine Casino — Luxury, Thrill, and Comfort in Toronto
customHtml.description:
Woodbine Casino, located beside the iconic Woodbine Racetrack, is a premier resort-style destination that blends gaming, relaxation, and entertainment. As one of Canada’s largest casinos, it features thousands of slot machines, dozens of classic table games, and modern electronic gaming options. The spacious gaming halls are designed with contemporary elegance, offering a thrilling yet comfortable experience for players of all levels.


The resort includes a luxury hotel with over 400 rooms, spa facilities, and a fitness center. Guests can enjoy a wide range of dining options, from Asian and Spanish cuisine to international favorites. Bars serve cocktails, wines, and snacks, while lounge areas provide a cozy retreat between games. Live concerts, shows, and special events — including tournaments and themed nights — are held regularly, adding to the vibrant atmosphere.


Woodbine Casino offers generous bonus programs for both new and returning players. Welcome packages include free spins and boosted deposits, while the Great Canadian Rewards loyalty program allows guests to earn points redeemable for slot play, dining, and exclusive perks. Members enjoy access to personalized offers, gifts, and seasonal promotions.


This is a place where excitement meets elegance, and every visit becomes a memorable experience. Woodbine Casino is the perfect choice for those seeking more than just gaming — it’s a full-scale escape into luxury, entertainment, and unforgettable moments.


Visitor Rules and Dress Code

Entry Requirements

  • • Minimum age to enter the casino: 19 years
  • • Must present valid government-issued photo ID
  • • Under 19 allowed only at racetrack during races, not in casino area
  • • Casino operates 24/7, table games may have limited hours

Dress Code

Not allowed

  • • Athletic wear (shorts, tank tops, tracksuits)
  • • Flip-flops or beach footwear
  • • Torn or dirty clothing
  • • Baseball caps in gaming areas

Smart Casual recommended

  • • Allowed: collared shirts, trousers, neat jeans, dresses, skirts
  • • Shoes: closed and presentable

Additional Rules

  • • No outside alcohol or food permitted
  • • Photography and video recording restricted in gaming zones
  • • Smoking only in designated areas
  • • Follow responsible gaming guidelines

Great Canadian Rewards Loyalty Program

Great Canadian Rewards is a unified loyalty program for all Great Canadian Entertainment properties in Ontario, including Woodbine Casino. Membership is free, and you can sign up online or at Guest Services.


How to Earn

Reward Points

  • • Earned on slots and electronic tables
  • • 100 points = $1 in Slot Play

Comp Dollars

  • • Earned on all gaming activity (slots, electronic and live tables)
  • • Redeemable for dining, hotel stays, show tickets

Tier Credits

  • • Determine your tier (Club, Preferred, Premium, Summit)
  • • Earned on all gaming activity except Slot Play


How to Redeem

Reward Points

• convert to Slot Play at machines


Comp Dollars

• use at restaurants, hotels, entertainment venues


Expiry:

• 6 months of inactivity will forfeit points and dollars


Tiers and Benefits

1. Club (0–499 credits): Basic perks, dining discounts

2. Preferred (500–2,499): Invitations to tournaments, cruise discounts

3. Premium (2,500–14,999): Complimentary room upgrades, early ticket access

4. Summit (15,000+): Free hotel nights, waived resort fees, VIP privileges


Extra Perks

  • • New member offers (e.g., up to $2,500 Slot Play)
  • • Exclusive event invitations and presale access
  • • Rewards usable across 12 Great Canadian Entertainment destinations

customHtml_2.title: Entertainment and Gaming at Woodbine Casino
customHtml_2.description:
Bonuses and Special Offers

Welcome Bonuses

  • • Up to 300% on first deposit + free spins
  • • Promo codes for free slot play

Gaming Promotions

  • • Slot and poker tournaments with cash prizes
  • • Jackpot draws for active players
  • • Horse racing bets with extra bonuses during major races

Entertainment Deals

  • • Discounted concert and show tickets when purchased on-site
  • • Combo packages: gaming + dinner + live show
  • • VIP packages with lounge access and priority seating

Seasonal Events

  • • New Year’s Eve parties with live music and prize draws
  • • Summer festivals featuring outdoor entertainment and food zones
  • • Major sports events screenings with themed promotions
  • • Halloween and themed parties with costume contests and bonuses [allevents.in]

Popular Games at Woodbine Casino

Slots

  • • Classic slots: simple 3-reel machines for traditional play.
  • • Video slots: 5- and 6-reel games with bonus rounds, free spins, and dynamic features.
  • • Progressive jackpots: prize pools grow with every bet. Popular titles:Mega Moolah, Divine Fortune, Age of the Gods: Jackpot
  • • Special features: cascading reels, Megaways (up to 117,649 ways to win), multipliers, expanding symbols.

Table Games

  • • Blackjack: multiple variations of this classic card game.
  • • Roulette: European and American versions.
  • • Baccarat: a favorite among high rollers.
  • • Craps: dice-based excitement.
  • • Sic Bo: Asian dice game.
  • • Electronic tables: automated gaming for convenience.

Poker

  • • Texas Hold’em and other variants.
  • • Video poker: combines slot mechanics with poker strategy.

Horse Racing Bets

Direct access to Woodbine Racetrack for live race betting and simulcasts.


Minimum and Maximum Bets at Woodbine Casino

Woodbine Casino offers a wide range of betting limits suitable for casual players and high rollers. Here are the main limits for popular games:


Game Type Minimum Bet Maximum Bet
Slots $0.10 per spin $100 per spin
Roulette $5 $2,000
Blackjack $10 $5,000
Baccarat $25 $10,000
Craps $10 $3,000
Horse Racing Bets $2 varies by event

Highlights:

  • • VIP areas available for higher stakes.
  • • Electronic tables feature lower minimum bets than live games.
  • • Progressive slots can award jackpots even on minimum bets. [scams.info]

Events and entertainment at Woodbine Casino

At Woodbine Casino, part of the Great Canadian Casino Resort Toronto, entertainment is curated as a continuous experience that fuses the gaming floor with live culture, nightlife, and racetrack heritage. The daily pulse is driven by recurring evening music programming across restaurants and lounges, where weekend live sets, DJs, and a crafted cocktail culture shape a club‑like ambiance without leaving the resort. This predictable “weekend rhythm” is deliberately designed to keep guests flowing between play, dining, and sound, turning casual visits into planned nights out and giving regulars a reliable nightlife anchor inside the complex.


The backbone for marquee shows is The Theatre at Great Canadian Casino Resort Toronto, a modern venue whose calendar reads like a city headliner list. Tour stops by international artists, high‑energy pop and rock productions, and multi‑show comedy runs routinely appear on the schedule, allowing guests to pair a ticketed performance with gaming and dinner in a single, walkable itinerary.


Nightlife is intentionally woven into the resort’s hospitality fabric. Lounges operate as refined nightclubs, emphasizing DJ‑driven sets, signature mixology, and intimate seating that can pivot from pre‑show warm‑ups to post‑show after‑hours. VIP‑adjacent areas complement the high‑limit gaming experience, offering privacy and upgraded service for guests who want seamless transitions from tables to late‑night ambience. This configuration mirrors Toronto’s late‑dining culture, aligning bar hours and music programming so that the evening unfolds as a single narrative: a bet, a bite, a show, and a dance floor—without ever hailing a cab. [greatcanadian.com]


The racetrack dimension gives the property a festival‑like identity on big race days. Live racing at Woodbine transforms the grounds into city‑wide celebrations featuring daytime DJs, fashion‑forward traditions like the Hats & Horseshoes party, invited performers, and extended entertainment blocks through the evening. Signature fixtures such as the King’s Plate integrate live music directly into the sporting spectacle, creating a unique crossover where adrenaline from the grandstand rolls into the casino’s nightlife just steps away, a seasonal draw that few urban resorts can replicate.


Seasonal tent‑poles round out the calendar. Halloween weekends, New Year’s Eve, and major sports finals are staged as themed nights with décor, limited‑time menus, and entertainment accents, often syndicated across city listings and ticketing hubs connected to Woodbine and nearby halls. For guests, this means highly discoverable “hot dates” that can be planned well in advance, with a focus on show‑driven evenings rather than gaming alone—very much in line with North American resort‑casino playbooks at scale.


Restaurants, Bars, and Relaxation at Woodbine Casino

Woodbine Casino is not just about gaming; it’s a full-scale hospitality experience. The resort features multiple dining options, including the Woodbine Club Restaurant, which offers a private club ambiance and panoramic racetrack views. Guests can enjoy continental cuisine in an elegant setting with a dress code that emphasizes sophistication: collared shirts, tailored trousers, dresses, and closed shoes. For those seeking a more casual vibe, there are restaurants serving diverse menus—from Asian specialties to European classics—alongside bars offering signature cocktails and curated wine lists. A convenient food court is also available for quick bites between games.


The on-site hotel boasts over 400 rooms designed with modern elegance. Guests can enjoy panoramic racetrack views, spacious accommodations with premium amenities such as free Wi-Fi, coffee machines, rain showers, and plush robes. The hotel includes relaxation zones like an indoor pool, a fitness center, and a wellness area for ultimate comfort. An internal corridor connects the hotel to the casino, allowing guests to move seamlessly without stepping outside—a major advantage during colder months.

items.title: How do I register at the casino?
items.answer: You can register at Guest Services or online via the official website. A valid photo ID is required.

items.title: What payment methods are accepted?
items.answer: Cash, debit and credit cards, and bank transfers for VIP guests.

items.title: Can I use foreign currency?
items.answer: All transactions are in Canadian dollars. Currency exchange is available on-site.

items.title: What languages are supported?
items.answer: English is primary. Staff can assist in French and occasionally other languages.
